title.content-text: 2.2.3 - Connecting the Enterprise Network to External Services

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts an activity in which you must specify the components, in order, needed to connect a service from the edge to the internal network. Begin with the component needed to connect to the service provider, and end with the end user.

Components

D M Z Switch
Punchdown block
Internal switch
D M Z router
T 1 circuit
CSU/DSU
Internal router
